# About the package
This package access directly to reported County crime  from API https://data.montgomerycountymd.gov/resource/icn6-v9z3.json. Some features are selected to visualize output related to crime, like different type of crime, number of victims, district, city and so on.
This package consists of two R scripts: 1- fetch_data.R which get data and store them in a data frame. 2- app.R that related to shiny app which visualize data from fetch_data
